meanings.definition: A type of collarless pullover shirt with a buttoned placket.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable henley to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new henley in his favorite color.
meanings.sent3: The henley looked like it was giving the other shirts a break from buttons.
meanings.sent4: The henley stood out in the sea of collared shirts.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the henley made it his go-to choice for casual outings.

meanings.definition: A type of rowing competition where teams compete in a series of races.
meanings.sent1: The annual henley brought together rowing enthusiasts from all over.
meanings.sent2: She trained hard to participate in the upcoming henley.
meanings.sent3: The henley race had an unexpected twist when a duck joined in.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere at the henley was filled with excitement and camaraderie.
meanings.sent5: Winning the henley was a dream come true for the dedicated team.

meanings.definition: A type of long-sleeved shirt with a round neckline and a buttoned placket.
meanings.sent1: He preferred wearing a henley during the cooler months.
meanings.sent2: The henley she bought had a unique pattern on the buttons.
meanings.sent3: The henley felt like a warm hug on a chilly day.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of henleys grew with each shopping trip.
meanings.sent5: The henley's neckline added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
